StationType.name: Fortress of the Charon Pirates
StationType.attributes: charonFortress, charonPirates, enemy, generic, human, majorStation, pirates, populated

StationType.name: Korolov Shipping
StationType.attributes: corporate, corporateCustoms, corporateDecon, friendly, human, populated, majorStation, korolovCharon, korolovShipping

Events.OnCreate:
(block Nil ; Create fleets of pirates to attack (for i 1 5 (sysAddEncounterEventAtDist 500 gSource &etPirateAmbush3; (random 100 200)) )
; Under attack (sysAddObjTimerEvent 500 gSource "OnTimerAttack1")
; Create drakes (sysAddObjTimerEvent 850 gSource "OnTimerAttack2") )
Events.OnTimerAttack2:
(if (eq (objGetData gSource "MissionStatus") 'underAttack) (block (pos) (setq pos (sysVectorPolarOffset gSource (random 0 359) 120))
; Create drake ships (for i 1 5 (block (theShip) (setq theShip (sysCreateShip &scDrake; (sysVectorPolarOffset pos (multiply i 30) 24) &svPirates;) )
(shpOrderAttack theShip gSource) (shpOrderGate theShip)
(objSetData theShip "Destroyer" True) (objRegisterForEvents gSource theShip) ) )
(objSetData gSource "DestroyerCount" 5) ) )

Dispatch.name: Korolov Shipping
Dispatch.InitialPane:
(block (missionStatus) (setq missionStatus (objGetData gSource "MissionStatus"))
(switch (and (eq missionStatus 'success) (sysFindObject gSource "AT:charonPirates;")) "DestroyFortressMission"
(and (eq missionStatus 'attackPlan) (not (sysFindObject gSource "AT:charonPirates;"))) "DestroyFortressSuccess"
"Default" ) )

Actions.Action:
(block (missionStatus) (setq missionStatus (objGetData gSource "MissionStatus")) (switch (eq missionStatus 'success) (scrShowPane gScreen "MissionOver")
(eq missionStatus 'attackPlan) (scrShowPane gScreen "DestroyFortressInProgress")
(eq missionStatus 'fortressDestroyed) (scrShowPane gScreen "MissionOver")
(eq missionStatus 'underAttack) (scrShowPane gScreen "UnderAttack")
(leq (typGetGlobalData &stKorolovShipping; "xp") 0) (scrShowPane gScreen "CantUseCommandCenter")
(scrShowPane gScreen "Defend") ) )

CantUseCommandCenter.desc: Sorry, only experienced pilots are allowed to escort freighters.

CantUseDockServices.desc: The dock services area is restricted to members only.

Defend.desc:
As you enter the command center, you see several people gathered around a central display table.
A woman approaches you, "We're planning a big attack on the Charon fortress in this system and we could use all the help we can get. Are you..."

Defend2.desc:
Before she can finish, the alarms bleat and she turns back to the display table.
Her face goes white as she sees the mass of signals approaching the stations...

MissionOver.desc:
After a violent pirate attack, the command center is nearly ruined.
"Sorry, no freighters are looking for escorts right now."

UnderAttack.desc:
The command center is filled with men and women shouting orders and counter-orders. The constant drone of sirens is punctuated frequently by concussive blow of explosions.
A woman shouts at you, "Get out of here and make yourself useful!"

DestroyFortressInProgress.OnPaneInit:
(block (pirateStationsLeft) (setq pirateStationsLeft (count (sysFindObject gSource "AT:charonPirates; -charonFortress;"))) (setq fortress (sysFindObject gSource "AT:charonFortress;"))
(scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "The command center is nearly ruined, but several people are tracking the tactical situation:\n\n" (switch (and (not fortress) (eq pirateStationsLeft 1)) "\"There is still one Charon station left in the system. Destroy it and you'll be done!\""
(not fortress) (cat "\"Although the Charon Fortress has been destroyed there are still " (strNumber pirateStationsLeft) " Charon stations in the system.\"")
(eq pirateStationsLeft 1) "\"There are two Charon stations still active in the system: the Fortress of the Charon Pirates and another lesser Charon station.\""
(cat "\"There are " (strNumber pirateStationsLeft) " Charon pirate stations left, in addition to the Fortress of the Charon Pirates.\"") ) )) )

DestroyFortressSuccess.OnPaneInit:
(block (roll) (setq roll (random 1 100)) (switch (leq roll 30) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itXRayLaserCannon; 1))
(leq roll 60) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itOmniParticleCannon; 1))
(leq roll 80) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itMarkIHowitzer; 1))
(setq gItem (itmCreate &itClass5Deflector; 1)) )
(scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Everyone cheers as you enter.\n\n" "\"We don't have much in the way of rewards, but it would be our honor if you would accept " (itmGetName gItem 0x040) ". The Charon pirates will no longer threaten the Commonwealth, and we owe it all to you!\"" )) )

Default.desc:
You are docked at the lifeless ruins of a destroyed station. Amid wrecked machinery and smouldering bodies you find a woman who is still alive.
She grabs your hand, "Avenge us...the Fortress is in the system...kill them all..."

Actions.Action:
(block Nil (setq gItem (itmCreate &itCharonPirateMapROM; 1)) (objAddItem gPlayerShip gItem)
(objSetData gSource "MissionStatus" "revenge") (scrShowPane gScreen "Map") )

StationType.name: Korolov Shipping
StationType.attributes: corporate, corporateCustoms, corporateDecon, friendly, human, majorStation, populated, korolovShipping, underConstruction

Main.name: Korolov Shipping
Main.OnScreenInit: (switch ; If we have not yet rewarded the player, do so (not (objGetData gSource "Reward")) (scrShowScreen gScreen "Reward") )

Default.desc: You are in the main hall of a Korolov Shipping Company station. The station is under construction.

You are docked at a station under construction. The manager of the station walks up to you to shake your hand.
"What do you think? We'll have this old station rebuilt in a few months. And we owe it all to you for destroying the pirates."

Actions.Action:
(block (roll) ; Pick a gift (setq roll (random 1 100)) (switch (leq roll 25) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itTargetingComputerROM; 1))
(leq roll 50) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itMilitaryID; 1))
(leq roll 75) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itMuleAuton; 1))
(leq roll 90) (setq gItem (itmCreate &itGreenEtheriumCrystal; 1))
(setq gItem (itmCreate &itRegeneratingNanos; 4)) )
(scrShowPane gScreen "Reward2") )

Reward2.OnPaneInit: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "\"We don't have much in the way of rewards here. But I've got something that might help in your travels.\"\n\nHe hands you " (itmGetName gItem 0x08) "."))

Actions.Action:
(block (xp) (objSetData gSource "Reward" True)
; Player gains korolov xp (setq xp (typGetGlobalData &stKorolovShipping; "xp")) (setq xp (add xp 500)) (typSetGlobalData &stKorolovShipping; "xp" xp)
; Give reward to player (objAddItem gPlayerShip gItem)
; Done (scrExitDock gScreen) )

Events.GetGlobalAchievements:
(block (theList theStatus) (setq theStatus (typGetGlobalData &stCharonPirateFortress; "status"))
(if theStatus (setq theList (list (list (switch (eq theStatus 'destroyed) "Destroyed the Fortress in the Charon system" (eq theStatus 'allDestroyed) "Cleared the Charon system for Korolov Shipping" (cat "ERROR: Charon fortress status: " theStatus) ) Nil "achievements & regrets" ) )) )
theList )
